channel.title: papers on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in papers on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: ongoing projects
item.description: my current research consists of: A general framework for implementing distance functions for categorical variables (van de Velden, M., Iodice D’Enza, A., Markos, A. and Cavicchia, C.) - Under review, arXiv, SSRN Parsimonious Gaussian mixture models with extended ultrametric covariance structures (Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G.) - Under review Globally optimal hierarchical clustering through linear programming (Willemsen, R., Cavicchia, C., van den Heuvel, W.

item.title: publications
item.description: refereed journal articles Cavicchia, C. and Sarnacchiaro, P. A new ranking calculation based on a composite indicator model: the case of the top 20 European football teams Quality and Quantity, (Accepted for publication, 2024+) Cavicchia, C., Sarnacchiaro, P., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G. A model-based ultrametric composite indicator for studying waste management in Italian municipalities Computational Statistics, (2024+) Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G.
